name: TextNeon
description:
Welcome !

With this simple plugin, add a glow neon effect on your text elements !


How to use this plugin ?

1. Select a text element to get started.

2. Click on the button to make it glow!!


Tip

This effect is cooler with dark UI, dark background, light text color andâ€¦ 1 2 3, GLOOWWW


Next Steps

TextNeon works with :

  • large texts
  • forms
  • pictures
  • more...


See you guys !

Do not hesitate to tell me your opinion on my first plugin at rneoon@gmail.com !
